amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 116-330 to require no less than 10 percent of the funds awarded under the Living Shoreline grant program be available to projects located within the Great Lakes.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 116-330 to require no less than 10 percent of the funds awarded under the Living Shoreline grant program be available to projects located within the Great Lakes.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Huizenga.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huizenga amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
